findings.title: Unlimited Transaction Fees
findings.description: No arbitrary limit set on transaction fees.
findings.location: Smart contract owner's ability to change transaction fees.

findings.title: Wallet Limit Manipulation
findings.description: No arbitrary limit set on max wallet limit, which can be changed to 'zero' by the smart contract owner.
findings.location: Smart contract owner's ability to change max wallet limit.

findings.title: Trading Status Manipulation
findings.description: Smart contract owner can stop users from buying or selling assets.
findings.location: Smart contract owner's ability to change trading status.
